vision.notes: Likely functional vision, given the surface-dwelling habits of most species. Further research is needed to determine spectral sensitivity and visual acuity.

chemoreception.notes: Antennae are prominent in cockroaches and used for detecting pheromones and other chemical cues, important for social interactions and finding food sources.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely sensitive to vibrations and touch via sensilla on the body and legs, aiding in predator detection and navigation.
